learnings.insight: useMemo can prevent expensive calculations from re-running on every render
learnings.connection: This will help optimize the data visualization component I'm working on

learnings.insight: Starting messages with context helps remote team members understand requests better
learnings.connection: Will use this in Slack channels to reduce back-and-forth questions

learnings.insight: Taking breaks every 90 minutes aligns with natural energy cycles
learnings.connection: Can structure deep work sessions around this rhythm
